main_address_raw_text: 〒130-0015 東京都墨田区横網2丁目5−14
short_description: tokyo byokan is a fastener supplier based in tokyo, japan.
long_description: sales and trade of metal, resin, and other industrial parts. manufacturing of fasteners, springs, and standard metal parts. manufacturing, sales, and trade of production machinery. employees about 300 domestic and 850 overseas. from asakusa, oshiage, keisei line, and hokuso line: take exit a3 from kuramae station towards kuramae bridge. 10 minutes on foot. tokyo byokane will continue to contribute to the advancement of social and economic growth as we strive to become a global enterprise founded on the trust of our customers and affiliated manufacturers. over fifty years of global expansion. developing business relations with over 15 established overseas locations. in addition to trading commerce, continuously developing effective methods for quality assurance, manufacturing, and delivery. we support the japanese handball teams "suisei japan" and "orihime japan".support is provided to various sports through sponsorship of the japanese national team competed in the olympic games, as well as various student sports.

generated_description: tokyo byokan, legally known as tokyo byokane co. ltd., is a company based in kowloon, hong kong. it specializes in the manufacturing, sales, and trade of various metal parts, including fasteners, springs, and standard metal parts. the company also produces electric machinery parts and production machinery. tokyo byokane operates over 20 sales and manufacturing bases globally, serving markets such as automotive, office equipment, electronics, precision equipment, and home fixtures. the company is committed to quality management, environmental sustainability, and corporate social responsibility.
